<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103751</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103751</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201341</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Drilling for the Ocean's Secrets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bohrung für die Geheimnisse des Ozeans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forage pour les secrets de l'océan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perfurar para os segredos do oceano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perforando per i segreti dell'oceano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάτρυση για τα μυστικά του ωκεανού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El perforar para los secretos del océano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This NASA site (for kids) features the career of oceanographer Will Sager, who narrates how the Ocean Drilling Program is involved in drilling and interpreting rocks and sediments from the ocean floor. Color images are also included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese die NASA Site (für Zicklein) kennzeichnet 
die Karriere des Ozeanograph Willen Sager, der berichtet, wie das 
Ozean-bohrenprogramm in die bohrenund deutenfelsen und in die 
Sedimente vom Ozeanfußboden miteinbezogen wird. Farbe Bilder 
sind auch eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site de la NASA (pour des gosses) comporte la 
carrière de la volonté Sager d'océanographe, qui relate comment le 
programme de forage d'océan est impliqué en roches et sédiments de 
forage et d'interprétation du fond océanique. Des images de 
couleur sont également incluses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local da NASA (para miúdos) caracteriza a 
carreira da vontade Sager do oceanographer, que narra como o programa 
perfurando do oceano é envolvido em rochas e em sedimentos perfurando
e de interpretação do assoalho de oceano. As imagens da cor 
são incluídas também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo della NASA (per i capretti) 
caratterizza la carriera della volontà Sager dell'oceanografo, che 
narra come il programma perforante dell'oceano è coinvolto in roccie 
e sedimenti perforanti e d'interpretazioni dal pavimento di oceano. 
Le immagini di colore egualmente sono incluse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή της NASA (για τα κατσίκια) 
χαρακτηρίζει τη σταδιοδρομία oceanographer sager, το οποίο 
διηγείται πώς το πρόγραμμα ωκεάνιων διατρήσεων περιλαμβάνεται 
στη διάτρυση και την ερμηνεία των βράχων και των ιζημάτων από το 
ωκεάνιο πάτωμα. Οι εικόνες χρώματος συμπεριλαμβάνονται 
επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio de la NASA (para los cabritos) ofrece 
la carrera de la voluntad Sager del oceanógrafo, que narra cómo el 
programa que perfora del océano está implicado en rocas y sedimentos
que perforan y que interpretan del suelo marino. Las imágenes 
del color también se incluyen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:WILL SAGER
FN:WILL SAGER
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>

N:NATIONAL AERONAUTICS AND SPACE ADMINISTRATION
FN:NATIONAL AERONAUTICS AND SPACE ADMINISTRATION
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201341</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103751</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/drilling-for-the-oceans-secrets</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
